医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
阿育吠陀药物与年轻女性的铅中毒有关CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）上的一篇文章重点介绍了一名年轻女性因阿育吠陀药物导致铅中毒的案例，以及诊断这种罕见疾病的复杂性 https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj。 230592。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Ayurvedic-medicines-linked-to-lead-毒性-in-young-woman.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Ayurvedic-medicines-linked-to-lead-毒性-in-young-woman.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04100136-9135-4282-9763-07f5574aab73 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 12:08:10 -0400 Ayurvedic medicines linked to lead toxicity in young woman
接种疫苗的人感染 COVID-19 后炎症标记物水平较低在同类最大规模的研究之一中，研究人员回答了接种 COVID-19 疫苗是否可以减少感染 SARS-CoV-2 后的疾病和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Vacculated-people-have-lower-levels-of-lingual-markers-after-COVID-19-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Vacculated-people-have-lower-levels-of-lingual-markers-after-COVID-19-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2381ad80-e88e-4acc-86ec-6281e2c2636e Tue, 08 Aug 2023 11:47:50 -0400 Vaccinated people have lower levels of inflammatory markers after COVID-19 infection
以学校为基础的干预措施为促进青少年心血管健康提供了机会研究人员讨论 SI 的结果！西班牙青少年中学试验计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/School-based-interventions-offer-opportunity-to-promote-cardioangio-health-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/School-based-interventions-offer-opportunity-to-promote-cardioangio-health-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c4636e2-2972-4796-865c-6b28da41fe7e Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:18:00 -0400 School-based interventions offer opportunity to promote cardiovascular health in adolescents
心理治疗对炎症性肠病患者的疗效心理治疗可以短期改善 IBD 患者的压力、焦虑、抑郁和生活质量评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/The-effectness-of-psychological-therapies-in-患者-with-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/The-effectness-of-psychological-therapies-in-病人-with-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=726909b1-4b78-4d10-a8e3-432503eefc68 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:15:00 -0400 The effectiveness of psychological therapies in patients with inflammatory bowel disease
患有 COVID-19 的 COPD 患者的结果标志物研究人员确定了 COPD 患者重症 COVID-19 和死亡的潜在标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Outcome-markers-in-COPD-病人-with-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Outcome-markers-in-COPD-病人-with-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cf40b57-38e9-4b34-8af8-66392f74689c Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:10:00 -0400 Outcome markers in COPD patients with COVID-19
替考拉宁不敏感的表皮葡萄球菌菌株是否在增加？研究人员阐明了替考拉宁不敏感的表皮葡萄球菌（Teico-NS S. epidermidis）六年来的发病模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Are-teicoplanin-non-susceptible-Staphylococcus-epidermidis-strains-increasing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Are-teicoplanin-non-susceptible-Staphylococcus-epidermidis-strains-increasing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e01a6e56-8499-461d-8ee6-23bc41cc8c16 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 10:01:00 -0400 Are teicoplanin-non-susceptible Staphylococcus epidermidis strains increasing?
鉴定与卵巢癌风险相关的血浆蛋白研究人员进行了蛋白质组学孟德尔随机化和共定位分析，以确定卵巢癌的药物靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Identification-of-plasma-蛋白质-关联-with-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Identification-of-plasma- Proteins-linked-with-ovarian-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65bd9937-63d1-4f99-9961-57c8cc21e353 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:57:00 -0400 Identification of plasma proteins associated with ovarian cancer risk
研究发现挖鼻孔可能会增加医护人员的 COVID-19 风险研究人员调查了医护人员的身体和行为特征（例如挖鼻孔）是否会增加 SARS-CoV-2 感染的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Study-finds-that-nose-picking-may-increase-COVID-19-risk-in-health-care-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Study-finds-that-nose-picking-may-increase-COVID-19-risk-in-health-care-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4bb2054-22e1-49ca-b903-cf1a6d62ce91 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:53:00 -0400 Study finds that nose-picking may increase COVID-19 risk in health care workers
研究发现肠易激综合症、胃肠道疾病和精神疾病之间存在遗传重叠研究人员描述了肠易激综合症的遗传结构，并研究了与胃肠道和精神表型的遗传重叠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Study-finds-genic-overlap- Between-IBS-胃肠道疾病-and-psychiatric-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Study-finds-genic-overlap- Between-IBS-胃肠道疾病-and-psychiatric-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc5bd629-3091-4b39-931d-fb8e4d55e446 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:50:00 -0400 Study finds genetic overlap between IBS, gastrointestinal diseases, and psychiatric disorders
COVID-19 限制依从性是否会增加年轻人的抑郁症状？研究人员对年轻人进行了调查，以评估 COVID-19 限制依从性与抑郁症状之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Did-COVID-19-restriction-compliance-increase-depressive-symptoms-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230808/Did-COVID-19-restriction-compliance-increase-depressive-symptoms-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a91af97-13ac-4bf9-8da8-f9963af3a8c7 Tue, 08 Aug 2023 09:48:00 -0400 Did COVID-19 restriction compliance increase depressive symptoms in young adults?
